chapters.title: Chapter 7: Pitfalls and Tripwires
chapters.info: Lady Naean Arawn, p. 151 (182)—A slim, palely beautiful Andoran noble with big, blue eyes and waves of black hair. She sneers a lot. She opposed Morgase during the Succession. Dyelin exiled her from Caemlyn, as Morgase did long ago, for attempting to take the Lion Throne.
